languages.text: "С твоим появлением в Просторе добычи стало на порядок меньше, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Если ксеносы хранят полезную информацию о далеких звездах... Это повод обдумать твое предложение".

traits.locale_text: "С твоим появлением в Пространстве добычи стало на порядок меньше, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Если ксеносы хранят полезную информацию о далеких звездах... Это повод обдумать твое предложеие".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."
languages.original_text: "С твоим появлением в Просторе добычи стало на порядок меньше, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Если ксеносы хранят полезную информацию о далеких звездах... Это повод обдумать твое предложение".

traits.locale_text: "There has been less prey in the Expanse after your arrival, greenhorn. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... This is a reason to consider your offer."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Hay menos presas dignas en la Extensión desde que llegó usted, {mf|novato|novata}. Si los xenos poseen información de utilidad sobre las estrellas lejanas... es un buen motivo para considerar su propuesta».
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: «Hay menos presas en la Extensión desde que llegó usted, {mf|novato|novata}. Si los xenos poseen información de utilidad sobre las estrellas lejanas... Es un buen motivo para considerar su propuesta».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “自从你来了之后，科罗努斯扩区的猎物就变少了，新来的。如果这些异形确实了解关于遥远群星的有用信息……我可以考虑一下你的提议。”
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: “自从你来了之后，科罗努斯扩区的猎物就变少了，新来的。如果这些异形确实了解关于遥远群星的有用信息……我可以考虑一下你的提议。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Le bon gibier se fait plus rare dans les Étendues depuis votre arrivée, novice. Si les xénos ont des informations utiles sur les étoiles lointaines... ça me donne une bonne raison de prendre votre offre en considération. »
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: « Le gibier se fait plus rare dans les Étendues depuis votre arrivée, novice. Si les xénos détiennent des informations utiles sur les étoiles lointaines... ça me donne une bonne raison de prendre votre offre en considération. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「お前が来てから、エクスパンスの良い獲物が減ったんだ、新しい血よ。異種族が遠くの星について有用な情報を持っているなら…これがお前の提案を考慮する理由だ」
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が来てから、エクスパンスの良い獲物が減ったんだ、新しい血よ。異種族が遠くの星について有用な情報を持っているなら…これがお前の提案を考慮する理由だ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Seit Eurer Ankunft gibt es in der Ausdehnung weniger Beute, neues Blut. Wenn die Xenos nützliche Informationen über ferne Sterne haben ... Dann ist das ein Grund, Euer Angebot in Erwägung zu ziehen."
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Seit Eurer Ankunft gibt es in der Ausdehnung weniger Beute, Grünschnabel. Wenn die Xenos nützliche Informationen über ferne Sterne haben ... Dann ist das ein Grund, Euer Angebot in Erwägung zu ziehen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Sen geldiğinden beri Enginlik'te şöyle güzel avların sayısı pek azaldı taze kan. Eğer ki zenolar, uzaklardaki yıldızlara dair kayda değer bilgilere sahipse... Teklifini değerlendirmek için iyi bir nedenim var demektir."
languages.original_text: "There has been less good hunting to be had in the Expanse since your arrival, new blood. If the xenos hold useful information about the distant stars... that is a reason to consider your offer."

traits.locale_text: "Sen geldiğinden beri Enginlik'te şöyle güzel avların sayısı pek azaldı taze kan. Eğer ki zenolar, uzaklardaki yıldızlara dair kayda değer bilgilere sahiplerse... Bu da teklifini değerlendirmek için iyi bir nedendir."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale
